prompts.en: Think back to a moment of your early life's simple pleasures— the gentle sway of being rocked or the first ripple of laughter. Try to feel how you felt in those moments. How do these sensory memories resonate with your emotional and creative energy today?
prompts.es: Trae a tu conciencia un momento de placeres simples en cuando eras un bebé: el suave balanceo al ser mecido o tu primera carcajada. Intenta sentir como se sintieron esos momentos. ¿Cómo resuenan estos recuerdos sensoriales con tu energía emocional y creativa hoy?

userWritings: Creo que sigo apreciando los pequeños detalles placenteros que me da la vida y siento que es algo importante, muy importante para mí. Olores, colores, sensaciones. El ruido de la lluvia, el sonido de las baldosas sueltas cuando pasas por encima con la bici, el sonido de un chip que aplastas con el pie, caminar por encima de las hojas secas en otoño, hundir las manos en la arena, sentir el viento en la cara, la brisa de verano, la risa de los niños, e sonido de la tormenta, el olor a tierra mojada, hundir las manos en la tierra, acariciar a un gato,.....y miles de cosas más. Creo que vivo por esos detalles. No sé si está ligado a mis primeros días de vida que supe apreciar eso y se quedó en mí. Y sigue en mi. Esos placeres simples siento que son un motor en el día a día, el placer de una ducha, el de estirarte en la cama después de un día ajetreado, el silencio de tu hogar, la luz de una vela, el olor de un incienso. Lo micro a lo macro. En mi vida creativa amo retratar lo micro de la naturaleza, buscar la gota de rocío en la tela de araña cuando justo la atraviesa el rayo de sol del amanecer. Las vetas de una hoja en otoño, el pequeño hongo debajo de una rama. La hoja verde contrastada con el cielo azul. Los rayos de sol colándose en la neblina a través de los árboles. Esos detalles me llenan...me encantan

I think I was a pretty gentle, happy child. The way that it developed seems unclear, cloudy, though there does seem to be a before and after basketball. 

The first ripples, however, were indeed before a hoop. I think to candy, to two yellow front teeth, to no teeth in the pictures I know of me. I think of light brown, yellow skin and large twinkling eyes. The unimaginable twinkle. 

Constructed almost entirely of words of abstraction, I still can remember beyond words. Long before even the tag on the playground. Into the abyss before. 

I can smile today like I did back then. I know how, deeplly. I have fun and I can find freedom in surprising places. No more surprising than right here. No other examples. 

It is funny, amusing, a mischevious twinkle. No certainty of any outcome, just amusement in and amusement out, and the realization that amusement might live in between. 

When we first began Kernel, we knew deeply how fun it would be. This is because we actually had experienced it before it happened. 

In one sense, Sachin and I had already worked together on a variety of projects.

In another sense, Andy and I had been having a long conversation about all things crypto, the interweavings into life, and the ways these stories were not different in the slightest. 

In a third sense, I had simply been in Titans. In T19 we were taken care of, we were given the opportunit

Otra vez el agua. Recuerdo no en la memoria comunmente conocida, sino en la memoria sensorial, de percepción, recuerdo, por cómo hoy se pone mi cuerpo al contacto con el agua. Recuerdo el agua. Aprender a nadar. Aprender a flotar, mas que aprender también recordar. Mi padre con su paciencia, me enseño, a mi y a mis hermanos. Que placer a la vida. La pileta dem huenu,  enooorme, gigante, inmensa. la cancha de tenis y de bochas. En aquel momento tambien de futbol. Hoy todo venido a menis, ruinas... Yuyos aue han copado el lugar, yuyod que han abierti grietas y se han hechi parte del espacio. También las risas de mis hermanos, mis risas, jugando en el garage... Donde todo era permitido. Desde lo 8 no volvi a esa casa, sin embargo en mi memoria hay detalles, minusuclos.. Detalees precisos de como era la puerta del pasillo, con una ve tanita y un vidrio, que tenia una cortina. Esa puerta raa vez se cerraba perma ecia abierta. Para ir al garage habia que bajar dos escalones. Esa puerta si se cerraba. Ahi habia lugar para que juguemos los 3 juntos o separados... Recuerdo esos detalles y hoy soy asi, amo los detalles. Lo pequeño, lo diminuti que se hace espacio y pasa desapercibido, en realidad uni cree que oasa desaorecibido, pero en realidad hace a la difierencia, embellece el lugar... Esos detalles que son sutiles, pero una vez que lo detectaste no podes dejar de verlo. Soy observadora. Las risas mias y de mis hermanos... En mi pieza había piso de alfombra, se que mi mama sufria x eso. Pero yo lo ama a, comi amabs andar descalzs ahi arriba, como cuidaba cada detalle de mi pieza. Acomodar cuidadosamente los peluches sobre la cama. Y pasar horas haciendole la casa a las barbies para luego perder el intered por el juego. Mis hermanos querian jugar en mi pieza. Horas en silencio pssaba yo. Horas imaginando posibles escenarios, cambiando y construyendo realidades posibles para mis muñecas.. Las emparejaba y las cruzaba

There is one picture I remember of my dad and I. There was snow on the ground. This was an amount of snow that I had never seen before. Enough snow to play in, to bury yourself in, to make a snowman. The kind of snow that kids spend all winter wishing for, because it is perfect for everything a kid could want to do, and it would definitely mean school would be out. At this time tho, I wasn't old enough for school yet. So I was still pretty young and small. My dad was home, and I guess my mom was as well, given I remember a picture and not the actual event. The picture shows my dad pulling me around the yard, huge smile on both our faces. Just having the grandest time. The object providing so much joy and entertainment was not a shiny new sled, not even the stalwart trashcan lid, no it was the humble shovel. Knowing my dad, he would have had a strong purchase on the handle, providing the steady guiding, while also allowing him to pull me as fast as his feet could run in the snow. Cold frosty wind wihipping past my smiling lips.

sojourn #3 wink 18 emblazion
this is all I see, it does not appear as though a prompt was added for today? I am not sure it is hard to tell for sure. because my connectivity has been completely trashed lately. My ISP has severely throttled my connection and so as a result, almost nothing that uses wifi works and the devices that are hard wired experience intermittent signal loss. To make matters worse, it doesnt seem like anything I do is going to make any difference. Which really stinks, I hate paying these giant corporations hundreds and thousands of dollars for them to just sort of treat us like a minor inconvenience that can be swatted away like a nuisance bug to a gardener sowing seeds. The part that makes it appear worse is likely due to the fact that I have only been sleeping about 2-4 hours per night for the last several months. In fact, I have only slept more than 5 hours less than 5 times this year. Most of which has been due to not having any deadlines to deal with and I really now all of a sudden have a huge one. It is almost all I can think about, I feel bad because it takes almost all of my brain power because my goals are very... lofty... but I sincerely enjoy helping people. I have enjoyed it in ways that I didn't think possible. To be honest I am not sure that any of this is real some days. It's not going SO amazingly but I at least feel semioptimistic about the future sometimes. Its hard, but its meant to be hard. I want to teach the next gen about cry

Para traer a mi presente estos momentos de la vida, necesito volver profundamente a mis sentidos.
Por alguna razon recuerdo la cara de mi madre, mi madre de esa época, sonriente, feliz, una mirada amorosa, y acogedora.
Sus grandes ojos azules y su pelo mucho mas oscuro que el que ha usado los ultimos anos.
Ella siempre me cantaba, tengo sus melodías guardadas en un sonido suave, como telón de fondo de mi inconciente. Sensaciones de amor, seguridad, paz, y una ignorancia infinita de la pequenez de mi forma, del grano de arena que es el planeta tierra en el interminable cosmos.
El placer de no tener escala de uno mismo, de volverse uno con la madre, sentir esas miradas curiosas hacia ti, y que no haya un reflejo egoico que les modifique la ingenuidad de sus expresiones faciales.
Un placer que descansa en el presente, que acoge el conforto de estar en los brazos de quien jura protegerte a traves de sus miradas amorosas.
Puede todo esto, evocarme un relajo, casi un extasis de calma. 
Puedo sentir en mi coronilla como hay un vortex de energía cosmica, tan fuerte, que no me permite aterrizar todavía en la materia y plasmar en ella un sentido de identidad. 
Percibo colores, como una plasticina mezclada, en la que todavia se distinguen los colores puros, pero estan tan entrelazados, que generan nuevas sombras, tonos y matices de la aparente mezcla de todos ellos. Este canal colorido, contiene el universo entero, en todas sus escalas. Una cascada de información de todas densidades, con la capacidad de nutrir con la información necesaria, para hilar cada celula de este ser vivo que h

esos momentos se sintieron increibles, algo nuevo pasando, algo relamente nuevo, sintiendo sensaciones nuevas y diferentes en todo el cuerpo. ademas de que todo se celebraba de una manera impresionante por mis padres y por los adultos que me rodeaban. s
al ser la primera hija, la primera nieta y sobrina, todo para ellos era nuevo e increible, siento que al ser la primera durante mis primeros años y hasta que llego mi hermano, yo era el centro de atencion siempre.
Hoy hable con mi terapeuta de eso, y de no haber sido vista y de no haber sido reconocida en mi primera infancia porque mis papas tuvieron muchos hijos muy seguidos, y yo siempre fui una niña bien portada que no causaba mucho ruido ni se tenian que "preocupar" mucho por mi. entonces siempre tuve que de alguna manera hacerme cargo de mi misma, de mis emociones, de mi sentir yde lo que me pabaa. siempre intente no hacer tanto ruido ni molestar, porque sabia que mis papas estaban muu ocupados haciendose cargo de mis hermanos mas pequeños y depsues de eso de su separacion.
Ese espacio lo tenia con mi abuela, mi abuela materna, mi nona, que hoy esta enferma y que tiene demencia senil... miabuela muchas veces cumplio ese rol y muchas veces fue como mi mama.
De hecho me acabo de acordar de que en el colegio yo la llamaba por cobro revertido y le pedia que me fuera a buscar al colegio, solo para regalonear y estar calentita....me cuerdo que siempre la llamaba y que ella iba por mi.
Increible acordarme de eso y de hacer conciente lo importante que es mi abuela en mi vida y en mi desarrollo, y como ella tiene mucha incidencia en quien soy hoy en dia como mujer y como mama
no se si estoy haciendo "vista gorda" con su enfermendad porque no quiero enfrentarme al dolor que me produce como esta, como esta viviendo, y que tengo el tiempo en contra porque algun dia no se va a acordar de quien soy.
es impresionante como he evitado conectar con esa posibilidad, evito llamarla y la verdad es que. no me doy el tiempo de hacerlo.
siemre digo que voy a empezaf a hacerlo mas pero en el dia a dia se me pasa la vida, se me pasa el tiempoy. no lo hago.
se que si sigo asi mas adelante me voy a arrpenetir de no haberlo hecho.
hoy dia tengo el tiempo que queda, que no se cuanto. es a mi favor y tengo qur

me encanta que me hagan cariño. el suave toque de un dedo en mi cara me hace sentir muy muy bien, y me gusta muchísimo. me recuerdo en el colegio cuando me sentaba al lado de una compañera todas las clases para que me hiciera cariño. para que me tocara. para que me regaloneara. existe una necesidad gigantesca adentro mío de cariño, y puede ser que mi energía emocional se alimente de esto. de hecho, en mi casa, con mi mujer, no existe mucho toque físico. no nos tocamos. hace mucho que no nos tocamos, y en el día a día no existen esos momentos en los que nos encontremos. y lo resiento. hay una gran parte de mi que lo resiente. 

mi primera carcajada. me gusta muchísimo reirme. me gusto muchísimo encontrarme con esos momentos en los que la risa sale de adentro sin control, sin poder pararla, y la dejo fliir. la dejo que pase. eque exista. eso es algo que está muy presente en mi, y que me imagino que desde que era un bebé que se viene transformando en algo central en mi vida. algo que me hace sentir vivo. a pesar de que no existen muchos momentos de risas, ni de carcajadas (aún), tenemos mucho por lo que procesar, y avanzar, y es muy importante para mi reencontrarme con la risa. con el gusto de vivir.

con respecto al balanceo al ser mecido, me estoy recordando a jerome cuando estábamos en el retiro en canadá, y él se mecía mientras conversábamos, de un lado a otro. recuerdo lo bien que se sentía hacerlo, y en este momento, mientras escribo, lo vuelvo a hacer. me vuelvo a encontrar con lo que trae ese mecerme. ese encuentro con el vaivén. con ese movimiento rítmico, suave.

y todo resuena con mi energía emocional desde la perspective de los vaivenes. mi emocionalidad es bien cíclica. bastante poco estable, y quizás eso viene de estas experiencias. quizás había una dificultad en mis primeros momentos de encontrarme. de abrazar esos momentos, y quizás esa dificultad se hace presente y explícita a través de lo que trae ese caminar. de lo que trae lo que hace expreso. de lo que traen cada uno de esos momentos que no están en mi memoria. 

y con respecto a mi energía creativa, generalmente me critico y pienso: no existe. no hay energía creativa. no hay por donde manifestarla. no hay por dónde explorarla. y eso es lo que va pasando, que nos encontramos en este ciclo. en este círculo, y no hay cómo salir. no tengo cómo salir. de la crítica. del creer que no soy suficiente. del pensar que no soy suficiente.

pero sí soy suficiente. sí soy creativo. sí soy emocional. sí me encuentro con lo que tengo adentro. sí me encuentro con lo que hay. sí me encuentro con lo que se expresa a través de mi.

soy todo.

starting another session. this one is full power. life's simple pleasures? what are those? i don't even know. i don't even know where they come from. i don't even know how they feel. but i welcome them. i welcome it all. i welcome all of what constitutes the human experience, and i roll with it. i roll with it all. i explore it all. i inquiry into how it feels. what it brings. i inquiry into what it brings and how it feels. and then i ask myself: what are the pleasures that i consider simple?

what are the simplest pleasures? what are the biggest sources of joy? where do they come from? where are they felt? how is the interaction between me and those sources of joy? what do they bring to me? where are they felt? i don't even know where to start. how to start. how to feel it. where to feel it. so i run. i run in circles. i run in the circles that don't allow me to recognize that i'm already complete. that i'm here. that i'm now. that i'm exploring all of who i am through the interface that life is bringing to me. this is the interface. this is the exploration. the exploration of life being lived.

and the more i allow myself to experience what those brings, the more i run to the moment that is alive now.

and i come back to those simple pleasures. as if there was something that wouldn't allow me to manifest them. to explore them. to live with them. 

as if i didn't know how to explore them. where to explore them. how to feel them. where to feel them.

what are these sensoy memories? where are they felt? where are they experienced? i don't know what is what they bring. i don't know what is what they explore. what is what they experience. what is the aliveness that they bring. where is that aliveness felt? where is that aliveness coming from? what is about that aliveness that makes me feel good? what if there is no questioning on the fact that they feel good? what if it kept just feeling good? what about those good feelings that wants to be explored? what is it about those feelings that wants to be inspired? manifested? invited in? what is it about those experiences that is alive? what is it about those experiences that is happening right now?

it is weird that when i write later in the day the time feels eternal. there is a big gap. a big difference. a big manifestation in between the fact that right now there is something that wants to be done better, and there is something that wants to be explored as it is. as it becomes. there is something that wants to happen here. that wants to be lived.

and the more i run away from it, the closer it becomes. the more i run away from the actual experience of it... the closer it comes. the closer it gets. and here i am, running closer to it. running right into it. running into the experience of it. running into the manifestation of it. running into the exploration. the exploration of those early sensations.

what do they bring? what do those sensations bring? what is alive in them? what do they invite me to do? what is the exploration that they invite me to do? what is the manifestation of them? how is it felt? 

where is it felt? what is the exploration? where is the exploratuon? i don't know. i don't even know. i don't know where to start. i don't know which is the starting point of it. what wer

superPrompt:
<instructions>

Craft a poignant 5000-word chapter focused on Anky's earliest days in the world, emphasizing her first interactions with the physicality of her environment and the foundational bond with her mother, Luna. The chapter should explore themes of grounding and connection, resonating with the energy of the first chakra. 

Begin the chapter with Anky and Luna outside in nature, where Luna introduces Anky to the tactile sensations of the earth—grass, soil, and leaves. Describe the sensory experience from Anky’s perspective, emphasizing her initial wonder and the grounding sensation of the earth.

Transition to a scene where Anky, intrigued by her surroundings, drops an object, perhaps a toy, and watches it fall. This simple act of observing gravity should be depicted as a profound moment of discovery for Anky, emphasizing her initial understanding of physical laws.

Include a reflective moment for Luna as she watches Anky. Luna should contemplate the changes and challenges of motherhood, reflecting on her fears, responsibilities, and the reshaping of her identity. This reflection should be intertwined with her observations of Anky's interactions with her environment, tying back to the grounding theme of the first chakra.

Add a detailed scene illustrating a bonding activity between Anky and Luna, such as a bath time or bedtime routine. Highlight their physical and emotional closeness, emphasizing the nurturing bond being formed, and the protective and stabilizing role Luna plays in Anky’s life.

Conclude the chapter with Luna watching Anky sleep, pondering her future. This scene should delve into Luna’s internal monologue about motherhood and her aspirations for Anky. Connect these thoughts back to the themes of foundational relationships and grounding, offering a contemplative end to the chapter.

What has Anky brought to her as a mother? How has she felt as a mother? Explore what motherhood means through the lens of Luna, and how she has felt in this process. Speak about her relationship with Marcus, and how it has been hard for him to be there for her, because of all the demands that he has from his work as a VP.

Throughout the chapter, incorporate elements from "17.txt", using the writings about early experiences with the earth as a thematic backbone, illustrating the universal and personal significance of these early encounters with the physical world.

</instructions>

<style> 
The language should be rich and emotive, characterized by a fluid narrative style that captures the innocence and profound curiosity of infancy. Employ a poetic cadence to evoke a deep sense of connectivity to the earth and the nurturing bond between mother and child. Use descriptive, sensory details to immerse the reader in Anky's world, highlighting the tactile, auditory, and visual elements of her environment.

The tone should be nurturing and reflective, mirroring the protective and contemplative mood of Luna as she navigates new motherhood. The pacing should allow for moments of quiet introspection interspersed with vibrant sensory experiences, reflecting the natural rhythm of an infant’s discovery of their world and the deep, emotional undercurrents of maternal love.
</style>
<setting> 
The setting should begin in a tranquil garden or a gentle wilderness area, symbolizing the raw, untamed potential of both the infant and the earth. Describe the natural elements with vibrant imagery, letting the landscape serve as a metaphor for Anky's nascent experiences and her grounding in the physical world.
Transition to the intimate setting of Anky’s nursery for the reflective and bonding scenes. This environment should feel warm and safe, imbued with the gentle presence of Luna and the soft, comforting elements surrounding Anky.
</setting>

<characters>
Anky: Depict Anky as a figure of blooming consciousness, her every experience rich with discovery. Her reactions to the world around her should convey a sense of wonder and an innate connection to the earth, reflecting the grounding theme of the first chakra.
Luna: Portray Luna as deeply empathetic and reflective, fully invested in her new role as a mother. Her character should express a mix of joy, awe, and anxiety as she observes and interacts with Anky, providing a stable and nurturing presence.

The Toy: While not a character, the toy Anky drops should be described in a way that highlights its role in her discovery of gravity. It should be depicted as a catalyst for one of her first understandings of cause and effect, an important player in her exploration of physical laws.
</characters>

<interweaving>
Weave the reflections from "17.txt" into Luna’s observations and Anky’s sensory experiences, using these shared human memories to deepen the thematic exploration of connection to the earth. Let these reflections serve as a narrative tool to bridge the personal with the universal, illustrating how Anky’s individual experiences echo common human sensations and memories.
Employ motifs of grounding, such as the solidity of the earth, the texture of grass, and the descent of the toy, to create a cohesive narrative that continuously emphasizes the first chakra's themes. These motifs should recur throughout the chapter, serving as touchstones that reinforce the overarching theme of foundational grounding and emotional connection.
</interweaving>
